website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a easy-to-use intercom system with notable sound quality and outstanding range, Wuloo's products stand out among competitors.
pros: This wireless intercom system boasts an impressive 1-mile range and 22 channels, making it ideal for businesses and multi-level homes
Stations have digital code displays and deliver clear voice quality
cons: Although rare, some systems have arrived with at least one faulty station
Interference doesn't occur often but is possible

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Big house, tired of shouting? Super easy to use, super clear sound even on different floors at opposite ends of the house.
customer_reviews.author: breister

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and seller
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well. I can call/receive calls in my shop which is a metal building with a metal roof over 150 feet from my home. The sound is crystal clear. It's easy to set up (just plug it in) and use. I am very pleased. The seller is fantastic as well. Fast shipping time, great price, great customer service and communication. It's been a pleasure dealing with the seller and Amazon. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jeff l cougle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, especially for the non technical user.
customer_reviews.text: As long as the user only uses group, it works just fine, Sound quality is good, choice of operating frequency is good (selecting the frequency is a non - trivial effort though), but how to select the station to call is very awkward for the non technical user.
customer_reviews.author: Good Old Dave

customer_reviews.title: They Don't All Work!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 originally and one of them did not work! They sent out a replacement unit and it did not work either. Swapped cords from the good and all but still did not work. Unit is bad. Wuloo does not want to make good says they will have to have a replacement cord sent from China. At this point in time would not tell anyone to purchase these! We got ripped off and seems nobody at Wuloo cares to help make our original purchase of 4 units good. 2 out of 5 units they sent do not work so draw your own conclusions!
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for us with my 92 year old mother next door!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynelle

customer_reviews.title: This intercom system is ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that you have to program each unit with a different number. Then to call from your unit, you have to put in the code for the unit you are calling. Then put your unit back to your unit number when you are done. It's great for calling out to the garage but we find ourselves still yelling through the house as it is faster. If I could return them I would. Quality if good. Sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fader

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected out of the box Have yet to understand how to setup separate channels for different stations
customer_reviews.author: William C. Lorch

customer_reviews.title: Not easy for young children to use
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had with this set was the channels would not reset on their own. You have to manually reset the channel after using the intercom. Too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: mrspamt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use.  They work great.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 12 units to replace a phone line intercom system throughout our house and property. Took about 1/2 hour to set them up with each having the same codes and then place the units throughout. You can setup each unit with an individual code or set them so all units have the same codes. You can have them in your residence and in all of your out buildings. Sound is excellent and they work great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Already looking for something else
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) great to have with elderly mom in the home because they are super easy to use 2) better than screaming to call kids down for dinner Cons: 1) often get other people’s voices coming through, having to change channels on devices so you aren’t getting weirded out by random voices is a pain 2) “talk” button gets stuck often and eventually every inch of my home is treated to a long loud beeeeeeeeeeeeeep until I find which unit has the talk button stuck
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Sayell

customer_reviews.title: Great! but beeware of "group" button
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sound quality is good and great signal all throughout my home. Only thing that needs to be fixed is the group button. My intention was to use the group button to communicate with all intercoms in my home. Unfortunately, using the group button not only communicates with all the components in my home, but with neighbors who also have the same or similar intercom systems. It was a little creepy hearing complete strangers on my system. To fix this problem, I've set all intercoms to the same channel and code. Group button is completely hands off in my household to maintain privacy.
customer_reviews.author: M C B

customer_reviews.title: They work great. We love them.
customer_reviews.text: We love them! We got the 4 pack. One for the house and we have 3 buildings on our land. They work great. His phone doesn’t work in the metal building but the intercom works great. And everyone that sees them are fascinated that we have intercoms. 😂 Very reasonably priced and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Newer model with auto reset to default unit code
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sound is adjustable from very dim to super loud. Note the newer model can automatically reset the pre-coded unit to its default unit code, avoiding the trouble that earlier model has to be reset manually every time after calling.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Breath - Fast Run

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price, performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love this product from Wuloo. You can set it up as fast as you plug it in. It’s super simple to operate also. My wife was able to use it right out of the box. If you need an intercom that delivers, this one is for you. I plan on buying two more stations to put in other locations. I know as we get older, we may fall and I want to be able to use these for obtaining help from one another. I’m a believer and I back this product 100%. Finally, a product that performs as described in the catalog. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as Expected
customer_reviews.text: If you want or need a system that lets you talk to several other people, this system works. We set it up to communicate across our house and it provides clear communication, good range, and has plenty of channel opportunities to avoid interference with others who may be on similar channels. Super easy to change channels/groups, and the talk button is nice and large, easy for anyone to see and use. With the expandability you can add as many units as you need.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate, and I use it in my restaurant to communicate with different areas
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Bonilla Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good signal propagation.
customer_reviews.text: We have a large, two story, home built in 1928 with stucco walls that greatly hammer signal propagation. I purchased 5 units to replace the 35+ year old wired intercom. They are easy to use, just set each unit to the same channel and security code. They hold their settings when unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, put three in the house (upstairs and downstairs) and one in boat house which you can see is down the hill and the sound is great on all of them. Had alittle trouble keeping them on channel but contacted manufacture and they responded quickly and told me what I was doing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Nammie

customer_reviews.title: Great range!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 level split level. We have daughter with special needs. We can turn on the monitor feature wherever she is and hear her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: arlene deaner

customer_reviews.title: Building to building wireless intercom
customer_reviews.text: I installed these intercoms in my insulated metal workshop that does not get cell phone signals but it does work with this fantastic intercom system. It works well and is easily heard throughout my 40'X50' two story shop.
customer_reviews.author: John Carver

customer_reviews.title: Complicated for the family
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to set up but the whole channel system is very hard for kids to get their minds around. The sound quality leaves a lot to be desired - you have to be the right distance away when you speak and even then it takes some work to get what is being said. And we get this occasional, unexplainable static every once in a while. All in all, it will do for our purposes but I'm not overly enthusiastic about it.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent intercom system. Clarity and easy use. Nice to have 6 units to cover all areas of the house. My dad really liked and utilized this system especially on his last days when he was the sickest. They will continue to get lots of use with my mother. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good intercom system and works throughout my 4500 sqft home without any problems. Customer service is very good and is loyal to their warranty policy. They strive to keep you a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Strong signal - gets from one end of the house to another clearly
customer_reviews.text: Other intercoms could not pick up the master bedroom from the kitchen, or the garage. These units have a good signal which has cured all our communication problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Maikoski

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four units would not work due to a poor design of the power input jack. Replacement units received exibited the same problem. Returned units for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kramb

customer_reviews.title: Saves me a lot of steps and makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: This is great product . I use them for my elderly father who lives behind my house . He can’t hear his phone but can hear this .
customer_reviews.author: deneice

customer_reviews.title: Ehh not my quality
customer_reviews.text: Don’t recommend, we have 2 story house and it always seemed to have some type of interference
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I had to put one on each floor and garage because internet goes in and out in my area. These came in handy especially in garage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: Goiod Buy
customer_reviews.text: Son's family just bought a 5900 sq. ft. home with 3 levels. I bought this product, gave it to them and within 20 minutes all 6 units were in place and in use. They were thrilled and I got hugs. The system saved a ton of walking and yelling :). The quality of sound is excellent and operation is simple. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Home care❤️
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in to assist in communicating with my 90 year old mom and caregivers. First day seemed to be very easy!!! Clear and easy!!! Without reading directions, I’d say it’s a win-win!!!
customer_reviews.author: AWD

customer_reviews.title: Press menu then ch - for select a room then select ch+ For select group
customer_reviews.text: I like it, perfect fit on every room I live in two stories so one of them was installed in the kitchen the other three on every room, my throat is not affected anymore and I will not have to shout that they come to dinner
customer_reviews.author: Laredo local service llc

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a decent  price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well after overcoming a bit complicated setup in the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Y. Parekh

customer_reviews.title: Really good intercom
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice to use. We have it all throughout the house and we are all able to communicate without having to run to the other side of the house. Great quality good product. We would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We Love Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent alternative to hardwiring an intercom system
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Very good system for home use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little inexpensive system for home use. It was easy to set up and voice quality is very good. Once in awhile gets interference from other wireless radios, however, that's to be expected and it's only happened twice in three months. Very good system for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can now bug my brother in the back shop
customer_reviews.text: Its great, the sound is clear enough in a noisy shop to get messages through.
customer_reviews.author: Armory Plastics

customer_reviews.title: Maker should of paid more attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fast shipping & was pretty easy to setup but 2 things i definitely didn’t like that could of been alot better 1. The power cord that connects to device should of been at the bottom 2. USB sticks out about 3 inches thats a lot what an eye sour should of used angled USB power connector
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product was quick and easy to set up. I found it easy to use right away and the sound quality was good. I'm using it to monitor someone who needs extra assistance but is sometimes nonverbal so they can just push the call button and I know to help.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be plugged in yet easily reached when needed
customer_reviews.text: We had to learn to use the group function. Using individual stations is too confusing for senior with memory loss.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good intercom system
customer_reviews.text: All around good product. It does what it's supposed to do. My only two complaints are the intercoms seem from the 90's and the plug in port on back of intercom can be fidgety. 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment, Thank you the audio is a bit noisy on one of these devices.
customer_reviews.author: caridad  bailey

customer_reviews.title: An excellent performer with many features
customer_reviews.text: Pros:A small unit that performs very well. House to garage is 200’ away with no static and strong signal. Cons: white unit comes with a black power cord and power plug.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: One broke within a week but the others have been great and work for what we need
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Adam

customer_reviews.title: work great for my in-laws
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and work great for my in-laws. Good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: L&M

customer_reviews.title: 1 Word.. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Arived safe, stupid easy to work! literally a " Turn on and use " system ( plug and play ) Has really incredible range! i tested it on a school campus and got the distance between the 2 devices to about 600m and it worked flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: bobotron

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this from the my hubbys garage to our house works great
customer_reviews.author: Heather pritts

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage, do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality materials used in the construction coupled with a poor design. I would return the item but was unable to do so due to the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this product. My son and I live in a large house he upstairs & im downstairs. This great product has worked so well for us I would suggest everyone get one, even for your man in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Gilhooly

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: We found this product a little complicated for simple office use. It is not difficult to operate, it just takes more effort than a simple intercom should. We have also found that it does not work properly 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help is at the touch of a button
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with our intercoms. We feel safer being able to call for help if needed. We are 85 so we needed the peace of mind that these units give us.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for elderly parent. Works great. Gives them the comfort of knowing if they need someone for any reason they can reach us at the other end of the house with the intercom system
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Not bad If I can get the channel and code to stay where I want it
customer_reviews.text: They won't stay on the channel in code I put them on They keep changing back to what it was before What do I do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality. Can't even use the product.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is so bad that we are just going to throw them out. We have had them for a little more than a month and have never been able to understand anyone over them.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Snider

customer_reviews.title: Great Interoms
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product out of the box ready to use, plug in and your good to go. Reception is great from the farthest room on the second floor to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product with great features. Very functional with clear sound and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Gino V. Stalvey

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Wuloo Intercoms works great. We are able to communicate 1/2 a mile between Intercoms. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and undamaged
customer_reviews.text: It is working great in our building. It has a good range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I plan to buy again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality could be slightly better but it does accomplish the intended task.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No issues between units. Best intercom that I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: mike beydler

product_meta.title: Wuloo Intercoms Wireless for Home 1 Mile Range 22 Channel 100 Digital Code Display Screen, Wireless Intercom System for Home House Business Office, Room to Room Intercom Communication(4Stations Black)
feature_bullets: [Excellent Signal] Clear sound quality and long range. An enhanced signal with 5280 feet range helps ensure crisp sound quality. The most trusted wireless intercom system for home!

[22 Channel and 100 Digital Code] 22 channels and 100 digital codes in a secure wireless intercom system. Features an enhanced anti-interference and can work with other intercoms with the same digital channel code!
[100% Satisfaction] Love it or your money back! We provide a lifetime service for our intercom. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns about your purchase.

[Easy to Use with Detailed Manual] Features include Monitor, Talk, VOX, Group, and Calling function. Adjustable volume, power switch, display screen too! This intercom system is easier to use than others with user-friendly and step-by-step manual!

[Supported by Power Bank for Outdoor] This device is compatible with Power Bank (5V 1A) making it easy to take these intercoms any place you want. Besides, it designed with back hole for wall mounting.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
